name: 15-Puzzle
description:
15 Puzzle:

consists of 15 squares numbered from 1 to 15 that are placed in a 4 by 4 box with one empty position.

The goal of this game is to order slide the tiles / numbers so by the end the numbers are in ascending order.

Have fun  and let me know how many moves it took you.

As for me my fastest was 368 moves
